speaker.name: disconnect3d
speaker.biography: Disconnect3d is a security engineer at Trail of Bits where he hunt for security bugs in different kinds of software using both manual code analysis and various tools like static analyzers, fuzzers and others. He specializes in low level aspects and likes to understand how things works under the hood. On his free time, Disconnect3d plays CTF security competitions with justCatTheFish team and plays DoTA2 moba game.
